languages.text: "Это особая страта Комморры. Высокородные друкари, рожденные при особых условиях: их колыбелью до рождения была не амниотическая колба для вызревания, а живая утроба. Носить плод на протяжении долгого времени — почти что смертный приговор в Комморре: в таком положении друкари слишком уязвима для своих врагов и бесполезна в рейдах. Лишь самые могущественные друкари, способные окружить себя достойной защитой, могут позволить себе подобную роскошь в Комморре".

"It is a caste in Commorragh. Noble Drukhari born under certain circumstances — their cradle before birth was not an amniotic gestational tube, but a living womb. Carrying a foetus for such a lengthy term is as good as a death sentence for a female Drukhari — she is too vulnerable to her enemies' attacks and she is of no use on a raid. In Commorragh, only the most powerful Drukhari, who are able to surround themselves with the best protection, can allow themselves such an extravagance."
languages.original_text: "Это особая страта Комморры. Высокородные друкари, рожденные при особых условиях: их колыбелью до рождения была не амниотическая колба для вызревания, а живая утроба. Носить плод на протяжении долгого времени — почти что смертный приговор в Комморре: в таком положении друкари слишком уязвима для своих врагов и бесполезна в рейдах. languages.text: «Son una casta en Commorragh. Drukhari nobles nacidos en circunstancias muy concretas: se gestaron en un útero vivo y no un tubo amniótico de gestación. Llevar un feto durante un tiempo tan largo es prácticamente una sentencia de muerte para una Drukhari: es demasiado vulnerable a ataques enemigos e inútil para las incursiones. En Commorragh, solo los Drukhari, más poderosos, que pueden permitirse las mejores defensas, son capaces de permitirse un lujo tan extravagante».
languages.original_text: "It is a caste in Commorragh. Noble Drukhari born under certain circumstances — their cradle before birth was not an amniotic gestational tube, but a living womb. Carrying a foetus for such a lengthy term is as good as a death sentence for a female Drukhari — she is too vulnerable to her enemies' attacks and she is of no use on a raid. In Commorragh, only the most powerful Drukhari, who are able to surround themselves with the best protection, can allow themselves such an extravagance."

En Commorragh, solo los Drukhari, más poderosos, que pueden permitirse las mejores defensas, son capaces de permitirse un lujo tan extravagante».

languages.text: “这是科摩罗的种姓之一。只有从活生生的子宫里诞生的黑暗灵族，才有权被称为尊贵的嫡脉，那些从羊膜妊娠试管里诞生的黑暗灵族则没有这个权利。黑暗灵族女性的怀孕周期极其漫长。怀孕期间，她们没有力量保护自己，在突袭中也毫无用处，这无异于自寻死路。在科摩罗，只有那些最为强大的黑暗灵族，有权让自己享受最完备的保护的那些人，才有能力负担得起这样的奢侈体验。”
languages.original_text: "It is a caste in Commorragh. Noble Drukhari born under certain circumstances — their cradle before birth was not an amniotic gestational tube, but a living womb. Carrying a foetus for such a lengthy term is as good as a death sentence for a female Drukhari — she is too vulnerable to her enemies' attacks and she is of no use on a raid. In Commorragh, only the most powerful Drukhari, who are able to surround themselves with the best protection, can allow themselves such an extravagance."

languages.text: 「コモラフのカーストだ。貴族のデュカーリは特定の状況下で生まれる。彼らの生前のゆりかごは羊膜胎管ではなく、生きた子宮だった。これほど長期間胎児を抱え続けることは、女性のデュカーリにとって死刑宣告に等しい。敵の襲撃にあまりに脆弱な上、襲撃の役にも立たない。コモラフでは、最高に腕の立つ者たちで周囲を固めることのできる最も力のあるデュカーリだけが、そんな贅沢を許されるのだ」
languages.original_text: "It is a caste in Commorragh. Noble Drukhari born under certain circumstances — their cradle before birth was not an amniotic gestational tube, but a living womb. Carrying a foetus for such a lengthy term is as good as a death sentence for a female Drukhari — she is too vulnerable to her enemies' attacks and she is of no use on a raid. In Commorragh, only the most powerful Drukhari, who are able to surround themselves with the best protection, can allow themselves such an extravagance."

traits.locale_text: 「コモラフのカーストだ。貴族のデュカーリは特定の状況下で生まれる。彼らの生前のゆりかごは羊膜胎管ではなく、生きた子宮だった。これほど長期間胎児を抱え続けることは、女性のデュカーリにとって死刑宣告に等しい。敵の襲撃にあまりに脆弱な上、襲撃の役にも立たない。コモラフでは、最高に腕の立つ者たちで周囲を固めることのできる最も力のあるデュカーリだけが、そんな贅沢を許されるのだ」

languages.text: « Il s'agit d'une caste de Commorragh. De nobles Drukharis nés dans des conditions bien particulières... issus d'une matrice vivante, et non pas de tubes gestationnels remplis de liquide amniotique. Pour les femmes de notre espèce, porter un fœtus aussi longtemps revient à signer son arrêt de mort, car elles sont alors trop vulnérables aux attaques de leurs ennemis et incapables de se rendre utiles lors d'un raid. À Commorragh, seules les matrones plus puissantes, en mesure de s'entourer des meilleures protections, peuvent se permettre une telle extravagance. »
languages.original_text: "It is a caste in Commorragh. Noble Drukhari born under certain circumstances — their cradle before birth was not an amniotic gestational tube, but a living womb. Carrying a foetus for such a lengthy term is as good as a death sentence for a female Drukhari — she is too vulnerable to her enemies' attacks and she is of no use on a raid. In Commorragh, only the most powerful Drukhari, who are able to surround themselves with the best protection, can allow themselves such an extravagance."

À Commorragh, seules les matrones plus puissantes, en mesure de s'entourer des meilleures protections, peuvent se permettre une telle extravagance. »

languages.text: "Das ist eine Kaste in Commorragh. Adlige Drukhari, die unter gewissen Umständen geboren wurden — ihre Wiege vor der Geburt war keine amniotische Retorte, sondern eine lebende Gebärmutter. Einen Fötus für so lange Zeit auszutragen, kommt für eine weibliche Drukhari einem Todesurteil gleich — sie ist zu anfällig für Angriffe ihrer Feinde und ist bei einem Überfall nicht zu gebrauchen. In Commorragh können sich nur die mächtigsten Drukhari, die sich mit den besten Wachen umgeben können, eine solche Extravaganz erlauben."
languages.original_text: "It is a caste in Commorragh. Noble Drukhari born under certain circumstances — their cradle before birth was not an amniotic gestational tube, but a living womb. Carrying a foetus for such a lengthy term is as good as a death sentence for a female Drukhari — she is too vulnerable to her enemies' attacks and she is of no use on a raid. In Commorragh, only the most powerful Drukhari, who are able to surround themselves with the best protection, can allow themselves such an extravagance."

In Commorragh, only the most powerful Drukhari, who are able to surround themselves with the best protection, can allow themselves such an extravagance."

languages.text: "Commorragh kastlarından biri. Belirli koşullarda doğmuş soylu Drukharileri; oluşumu suni bir tüpte değil, gerçek bir rahimde meydana gelenleri simgeliyor. Karnında bir bebekle o kadar uzun süre dolaşmak, dişi bir Drukhari için ölüm fermanı gibidir. Ne olası saldırılara karşı koyabilir ne de baskına çıkabilir. Commorragh'da bu tarz bir ayrıcalığa yalnızca en güçlü, kendini sağlama almayı başarmış Drukhariler sahip olabilir."
